class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/publish/publishing-and-guidelines.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Publishing and Guidelines</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/publish/private-addon-deployment.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Private addon deployment</span></div></a></div></div></div></section></nav></div></aside><div class="content_edeb4 rspress-doc-container flex flex-shrink-0 mx-auto"><div class="w-full flex-1"><div><div class="rspress-doc"><h1 id="clockify-add-on-quick-start-guide" class="rspress-doc-title text-3xl mb-10 leading-10 tracking-tight title_3b154">Clockify Add-on Quick Start Guide<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#clockify-add-on-quick-start-guide">#</a></h1>
<h2 id="developer-account" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Developer account<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#developer-account">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Before starting our development process, we will need to create a CAKE.com developer account.
A developer account will allow us to publish, manage and monetize our add-ons as well as provide us with a testing environment and workspace where the add-on can be installed and tested during development.
You can learn more about how to get started with the developer account <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/developer-account.html">here</a>.</p>
<h2 id="lets-get-started-with-developing-a-simple-add-on" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Let’s get started with developing a simple add-on.<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#lets-get-started-with-developing-a-simple-add-on">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">In this guide we’ll build a new add-on from scratch and go through the development steps one by one, but first we have to define what an add-on is.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Add-ons are software components that can be used to extend the functionalities of CAKE.com products.
They are technology-agnostic, meaning they can be developed using the languages and frameworks of your choice.
For this guide we will be writing our add-on in Java, using the CAKE.com <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://github.com/clockify/addon-java-sdk" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">Addon SDK</a> and <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://resources.developer.clockify.me/ui/latest/showcase/?path=/story/introduction--page" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">UI Kit</a>.</p>
<h2 id="defining-our-add-on-and-its-scope" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Defining our add-on and its scope<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#defining-our-add-on-and-its-scope">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Before starting our development process, we’ll need to define how our add-on will look like and what it aims to achieve.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">For this guide, we will create a simple add-on which will add a new page to the Clockify's sidebar and will display a statistic of the time tracked by the current user.
As part of the guide we will implement and host a backend service and also integrate our add-on into Clockify’s UI.</p>
<h2 id="what-to-build" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">What to build<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#what-to-build">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">If you’re not sure what to build and what needs users have, you can check our
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://clockify.me/roadmap" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">roadmap</a> and get ideas from suggested add-ons or feedback
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://forum.clockify.me/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">Forum</a> categories.</p>
<h2 id="setting-up-a-new-project" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Setting up a new project<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#setting-up-a-new-project">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We’ll start our development flow by creating a new project for our add-on. Let’s call it “Time Reports”.</p>
<ol class="list-decimal pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">We’ll create our first file named TimeReportsAddon.java, containing the following code:</li>
</ol>
<div class="language-java"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-java" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">package</span><span> </span><span class="token namespace">com</span><span class="token namespace" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token namespace">cake</span><span class="token namespace" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token namespace">marketplace</span><span class="token namespace" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token namespace">examples</span><span class="token namespace" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token namespace">timereports</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">class</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">TimeReportsAddon</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">static</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">main</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token class-name">String</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span> args</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<ol start="2" class="list-decimal pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">We’ll need to set up our Maven dependencies. This step consists of three parts:</li>
</ol>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Configure and authenticate Github with maven as described in the following <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://docs.github.com/en/packages/working-with-a-github-packages-registry/working-with-the-apache-maven-registry#authenticating-with-a-personal-access-token" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">page</a>.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Configure our package repository in the <em><strong class="font-semibold">pom.xml</strong></em> file by adding the following snippet:</li>
</ul>
<div class="language-bash"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><code>&lt;repositories&gt;
   &lt;repository&gt;
       &lt;id&gt;github&lt;/id&gt;
       &lt;url&gt;https://maven.pkg.github.com/clockify/addon-java-sdk&lt;/url&gt;
   &lt;/repository&gt;
&lt;/repositories&gt;
</code></div></div>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Configure our package dependency in the <em><strong class="font-semibold">pom.xml</strong></em> file by adding the following snippet:</li>
</ul>
<div class="language-bash"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><code>&lt;dependencies&gt;
   &lt;dependency&gt;
       &lt;groupId&gt;com.cake.clockify&lt;/groupId&gt;
       &lt;artifactId&gt;addon-sdk&lt;/artifactId&gt;
       &lt;version&gt;1.4.0&lt;/version&gt;
   &lt;/dependency&gt;
&lt;/dependencies&gt;
</code></div></div>
<h2 id="building-our-manifest" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Building our manifest<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#building-our-manifest">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Now that we have successfully set up our project and dependencies we can start working on the add-on itself.
First, let's briefly explain what a manifest is.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">A manifest is a file which describes an add-on and its functionalities.
Through the manifest you can define how your add-on integrates with CAKE.com products.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The format of the manifest file depends on the CAKE.com product your add-on is targeting, but in general will contain information about the add-on such as its identifier, name, permission scopes and other definitions that describe how it will interact with the product.
You can read more about the manifest, its syntax and various options on the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/manifest/index.html">manifest</a> section of the documentation.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The Addon SDK provides a simple way to build and host our manifest file dynamically.
Let’s start by defining the manifest object, and then we’ll go over the details.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Our <em>main()</em> method will look like this:</p>
<div class="language-java"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-java" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">static</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">main</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token class-name">String</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span> args</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">throws</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">Exception</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> manifest </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">ClockifyManifest</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">v1_3Builder</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">key</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"time-reports-example"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">name</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Time Reports"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">baseUrl</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">""</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">requireFreePlan</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">description</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Example add-on that displays time statistics"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">scopes</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token class-name">List</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">of</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token class-name">ClockifyScope</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>TIME_ENTRY_READ</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">build</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Let’s go over the lines step by step.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Builder interface</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We'll start by using the builder interface to guide us through the steps needed to construct our manifest.
The manifest builder interface exposes one method for each supported schema version. In this guide we will use version 1.3 of the manifest schema.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Key</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The add-on key acts as an identifier for our add-on and must be a unique value among all add-ons published on the CAKE.com marketplace.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Name</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The add-on name is also a required field and must match the name under which the add-on gets published to the CAKE.com marketplace.
In the UI, the name will be displayed on Clockify's add-on settings tab.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Base URL</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The base URL is the URL that will act as the base location for our add-on. Other paths will be defined relative to this URL.
We're setting it to an empty value at this point as we do not yet have a publicly available URL we can use.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Subscription plan</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The minimal subscription plan is the minimum plan that Clockify workspaces must have in order to be able to install and use our add-on.
The <code>requireFreePlan()</code> method is a helper which sets the minimum required plan value to ‘FREE’.
Other supported values for the plan can be found on the manifest section. </p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Description</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The description field is an optional field, and can be populated with a short description of the add-on.
The text will be visible on Clockify's add-on settings tab.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Scopes</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Scopes are optional, but have to be defined if we intend to use certain features of the Clockify API.
For our example we need to request the <code>TIME_ENTRY_READ</code> scope since we will be making requests to the time entries endpoint.</p>
<h2 id="building-our-ui-component" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Building our UI component<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#building-our-ui-component">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Now that we've built the manifest object, the next step will be to define and serve our UI component.
Let's start by defining our component first, and then we'll get to the HTML part of the UI.</p>
<div class="language-java"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-java" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> uiComponent </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">ClockifyComponent</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">builder</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">sidebar</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">allowEveryone</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">path</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"/sidebar-component"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">label</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Time Reports"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">build</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">In this guide we will be defining a single UI component which will be shown as a separate entry on the sidebar.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Builder</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Similar to the manifest, we will use a builder interface to construct our component.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Location</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Specifies where the entry point where our component will be located.
We’ve chosen the sidebar location for this example, but there is a wide range of options that can be chosen depending on your use case.
For more information on the location field, visit the manifest’s components section.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Access</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Specifies the type of permission the user must have in order to access our component.
Supported values are admins, or everyone. We will be showing our add-on to every user of the workspace.
For more information on the access field, visit the manifest’s components section.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Path</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The path is a value relative to the base URL defined in the manifest.
A <code>GET</code> request will be made to this location every time the UI component is loaded in UI.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">UI components are loaded inside iframes and will always be supplied with an authentication token query parameter, named as <code>auth_token</code>.
This token can be used to identify and authenticate the user who is viewing our component.
For more information on the component’s authentication, visit the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html">authentication</a> section.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Label</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The label is a text field whose value will be shown on the component’s defined location - the sidebar in our case.
You can read more about the label under the manifest’s components section.</p>
<h2 id="building-our-ui" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Building our UI<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#building-our-ui">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To build our UI we will use the CAKE.com <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://resources.developer.clockify.me/ui/latest/showcase/?path=/story/introduction--page" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">Add-on UI kit</a>.
Let’s start by creating an empty sidebar-component.html file under our resources folder.</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Import dependencies</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Let's add the required imports for the Add-on UI kit.
For the purpose of this guide we will also be importing the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://date-fns.org/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">date-fns</a> library which will be used to process time values.</p>
<div class="language-html"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-html" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">html</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">       </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">/&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>       </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);"> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">src</span><span class="token attr-equals" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">=</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string-expression);">https://resources.developer.clockify.me/ui/latest/js/main.min.js</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>       </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);"> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">src</span><span class="token attr-equals" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">=</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string-expression);">https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/date-fns@4.1.0/cdn.min.js</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>   </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">head</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>

<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Define UI elements</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Now that we’ve imported the UI kit, our next step is to create a body tag and then define our UI elements.</p>
<div class="language-html"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-html" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">body</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>       </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);"> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">class</span><span class="token attr-equals" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">=</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string-expression);">tabs-header</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>           </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);"> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">class</span><span class="token attr-equals" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">=</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string-expression);">tab-header active</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);"> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">data-tab</span><span class="token attr-equals" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">=</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string-expression);">tab1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>Time Reports</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>       </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>       </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);"> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">class</span><span class="token attr-equals" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">=</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string-expression);">tabs-content</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>           </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);"> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">class</span><span class="token attr-equals" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">=</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string-expression);">tab-content tab1 active</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">p</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>Your total tracked time is: </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">span</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);"> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">id</span><span class="token attr-equals" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">=</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string-expression);">tracked-time</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">span</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">p</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>           </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>       </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">div</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">body</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Retrieving and decoding the authentication token</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Our next goal will be to retrieve our time entries data through Clockify’s API and present a simple overview of the total time tracked.
The first thing that we need to do is to create a script section at the end of our file.</p>
<div class="language-html"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-html" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span><span class="token script language-javascript">
</span></span><span class="token script language-javascript" style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span>    
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span class="token script language-javascript"></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&lt;/</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">script</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">&gt;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Next, we’ll retrieve the authentication token that Clockify provides to our <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html">component</a> and use that token to make a call to the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://docs.developer.clockify.me/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">Clockify API</a>.</p>
<div class="language-javascript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-javascript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> token </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">URLSearchParams</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>window</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>location</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>search</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'auth_token'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Clockify’s add-ons can be installed on a wide range of environments, be it on a regional instance or even on development test workspaces.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To ensure that add-ons can work independent of the environment where they are installed, we have to retrieve all the environment-related information from the authentication token - which is in fact a <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://jwt.io/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">JWT</a>.
You can learn more about the claims present in the JWT token on the following <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/learn/introduction.html#how-does-clockify-interact-with-add-on-through-ui">link</a>.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">For our component, we’re mostly interested in the following three claims:</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">backendUrl - the URL of the backend (environment) where our API calls will be made</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">workspaceId - the ID of the workspace where our add-on was installed</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">user - the ID of the user that is currently viewing our component</li>
</ul>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">It should be noted that each authentication token that is supplied to the iframe only references a specific add-on install on a single workspace.</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This example will bypass the verification step and only retrieve the claims from the token, but it’s <em><strong class="font-semibold">strongly</strong></em> recommended that production add-ons perform the proper validations before accepting the token as valid.</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The JWT is signed with RSA256. The public key used to verify the token can be accessed on the following <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html">link</a>.</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="language-javascript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-javascript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// note: JWT tokens and their respective claims should always be verified before being accepted</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> tokenPayload </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-constant);">JSON</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">parse</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">atob</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>token</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">split</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'.'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> backendUrl </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> tokenPayload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'backendUrl'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> workspaceId </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> tokenPayload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'workspaceId'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> userId </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> tokenPayload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'user'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Interacting with the API</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Now, it’s time to make the API call.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">While Clockify provides endpoints for generating reports, to keep it simple we’re going to call the time entries endpoint which can be found <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://docs.developer.clockify.me/#tag/Time-entry/operation/getTimeEntries" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">here</a>.</p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Note that we're using the values we retrieved from the claims to construct the endpoint we're calling.</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="language-javascript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-javascript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> oneWeekAgo </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">subWeeks</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">Date</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">fetch</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token template-string template-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">`</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">${</span><span class="token template-string interpolation">backendUrl</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token template-string" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">/v1/workspaces/</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">${</span><span class="token template-string interpolation">workspaceId</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token template-string" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">/user/</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">${</span><span class="token template-string interpolation">userId</span><span class="token template-string interpolation interpolation-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token template-string" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">/time-entries?</span><span class="token template-string template-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">`</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">+</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">'page-size'</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token number">500</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">'start'</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">formatISO</span><span class="token" style="color: </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>            </span><span class="token literal-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">headers</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span class="token string-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">"x-addon-token"</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> token</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token literal-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">method</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"GET"</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">then</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token parameter">response</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">if</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>status </span><span class="token operator">!==</span><span> </span><span class="token number">200</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">return</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span>        
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">let</span><span> totalDurationSeconds </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>        response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">json</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">forEach</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token parameter">entry</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> start </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> entry</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"timeInterval"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"start"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> end </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> entry</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"timeInterval"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"end"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> durationSeconds </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">differenceInSeconds</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">parseISO</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>end</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">parseISO</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>start</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
