</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> element </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> document</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getElementById</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"tracked-time"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">22</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">if</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>totalDurationSeconds </span><span class="token operator">!==</span><span> </span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">23</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> duration </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">intervalToDuration</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token literal-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">start</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token number">0</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token literal-property" style="color: var(--code-token-parameter);">end</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> totalDurationSeconds </span><span class="token operator">*</span><span> </span><span class="token number">1000</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">24</span><span>            element</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>textContent </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> dateFns</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">formatDuration</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>duration</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">25</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">else</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">26</span><span>            element</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>textContent </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"no time tracked"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">27</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">28</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">29</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">catch</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token parameter">e</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Could not retrieve time entries"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">30</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">In the above snippet, we call the Clockify API and retrieve a list of time entries for our user.
Then, we iterate through the entries and sum up all the durations which will then be used to display the total duration in a human friendly way.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">You will notice we supplied a header named <code>x-addon-token</code>. The token used to make this API call is the same token that was supplied at the moment our component was served.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This token has access only over the user that is currently viewing our UI component inside the Clockify iframe, and unlike the token that is supplied during the add-on install expires in 30 minutes.</p>
<h2 id="serving-our-add-on" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Serving our add-on<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#serving-our-add-on">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Now that our UI is ready, we need to go back to our Java class and set up the webserver for our add-on.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The Addon SDK provides an embedded web server which we can use to quickly set up and serve our manifest and the UI.</p>
<div class="language-java"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-java" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> addon </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">ClockifyAddon</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>manifest</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>addon</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">registerComponent</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>uiComponent</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>request</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">-&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> classLoader </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">Thread</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">currentThread</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getContextClassLoader</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> inputStream </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> classLoader</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getResourceAsStream</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"sidebar-component.html"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>    inputStream</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">transferTo</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getOutputStream</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>    response</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">setStatus</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token class-name">HttpServletResponse</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>SC_OK</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> servlet </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">AddonServlet</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>addon</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">var</span><span> server </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">EmbeddedServer</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>servlet</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>server</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">start</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token number">8080</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The manifest will be automatically served under the <code>/manifest</code> path, while for the UI we will register a handler which will load the HTML file from the resources and serve it to the response.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The UI component will be served under the path that was previously configured.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Our add-on is ready to be run, simply run the <code>main()</code> method and access the add-on manifest on <code>{baseUrl}/manifest</code> to install it on your development workspace.</p>
<h2 id="testing-our-add-on" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Testing our add-on<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#testing-our-add-on">#</a></h2>
<h3 id="developer-account-1" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Developer account<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#developer-account-1">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Now that we've got our add-on up and running we are ready to continue with the next step - trying out the add-on on the Clockify developer environment.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">In order to do so, we first need to create a <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/developer-account.html">developer account</a>.</p>
<h3 id="testing-environment" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Testing environment<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#testing-environment">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Once the account is set up, the next step is to access the testing environment for our account.
The testing environment is a pre-populated environment where you can test how your add-on would work in a real Clockify workspace.
Testing environments are unique to each developer account, and the created workspaces have access to all Clockify features.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To access the testing environment, follow these steps:</p>
<ol class="list-decimal pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Log in to your <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://developer.marketplace.cake.com/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">developer account</a></li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Navigate to the <em><strong class="font-semibold">Test accounts</strong></em> section and log in as one of the pre-made users</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">You’ll be redirected to the Clockify test environment</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">From there, go to <em><strong class="font-semibold">Workspace settings</strong></em></li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Select the <em><strong class="font-semibold">Add-ons</strong></em> tab (visible only to users with the administrator role)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Insert the link to your add-on manifest and click <code>Install</code></li>
</ol>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">A toast message will appear indicating a successful installation.
All the installed add-ons will be listed on this page.</p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Multiple add-ons can be installed on testing environments as long as the manifest keys are unique among them.</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><img src="/static/image/marketplace-testing-env.5ecfabd0.png" alt="Testing Environment Add-ons" class="medium-zoom-image"></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The following info will be displayed on this page:</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Icon (if available, if not – default image)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Name (from manifest)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Status (enabled/disabled)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Short description (from manifest)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">More options (listed if there are any)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Settings (Optional and defined in manifest. If they exist, you can click on the Settings, and the Add-on settings page will open.)</li>
</ul>
<div class="language-bash"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><code>There are two types of settings:

Clockify settings – saved on our server and specified in manifest
Settings – add-on settings that can be done by developers and displayed as an iFrame on this page)
</code></div></div>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Enable/disable (Installed add-on is automatically enabled)</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Webhooks (opens a modal regarding add-on webhooks)
Modal that opens displays webhooks that are sent from Clockify to this add-on.</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Uninstall (disabled add-on and removes it from the list)</li>
</ul>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To maintain a secure environment and prevent potential misuse, your data will be automatically cleared every month.</p>
</blockquote>
<h3 id="providing-a-public-url" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Providing a public URL<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#providing-a-public-url">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To be able to install our add-on, we first need to provide a public URL.
We can do so by using a reverse proxy service such as <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://ngrok.com/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">ngrok</a>.
Let's create a free account at <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://ngrok.com/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">ngrok</a> and follow their guidelines for installing &amp; running app <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://ngrok.com/docs/getting-started/" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">docs</a>.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">After you’ve setup ngrok, run the following command:</p>
<div class="language-shell"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-shell" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 1.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>ngrok http 8080</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">This will generate tunnel to your app running on port 8080.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><img src="/static/image/ngrok.46656db7.png" alt="Ngrok CLI" class="medium-zoom-image"></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Note the public URL in the output:</p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://7ba8-188-246-34-133.eu.ngrok.io" class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154">https://7ba8-188-246-34-133.eu.ngrok.io</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We can now go back to our add-on's code and provide this public URL as the base URL for our manifest.</p>
<h3 id="installing-our-add-on" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Installing our add-on<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#installing-our-add-on">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Once we've opened the add-ons tab on our workspace, we are ready to install our add-on.
With the add-on webserver running and our public URL configured, we'll paste in the link to our manifest <code>{base URL}/manifest</code> and click on install.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We can now see that our add-on has been successfully installed.
It will show up on the sidebar like in the screenshot below:</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><img src="/static/image/add-on-sidebar.5ada55ce.png" alt="Sidebar Add-on" class="medium-zoom-image"></p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We can now click on our sidebar entry to access our add-on's UI.</p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">You may notice that our sidebar entry is using a default icon. You can specify a custom icon by setting the iconPath property on the UI component.</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><img src="/static/image/add-on-ui.201c349f.png" alt="UI Add-on" class="medium-zoom-image"></p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">You may observe the UI component has been loaded inside an iframe. UI components are always loaded inside iframes, irrespective of their location.</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 id="next-steps" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Next steps<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#next-steps">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We've prepared a <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/publish/development-checklist.html">Development Checklist</a> which will help you ensure that you've taken care of all the important aspects of the add-on development flow.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">After you've gone through our development checklist, you are ready to check out our add-on <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/publish/publishing-and-guidelines.html">publishing section</a> for a detailed overview of the add-on publishing flow.</p></div><div class="rspress-doc-footer"><footer class="mt-8"><div add-on.</span></a></li><li><a href="#defining-our-add-on-and-its-scope" title="Defining our add-on and its scope" class="aside-link transition-all duration-300 hover:text-text-1 text-text-2 block" class="rspress-sidebar-collapse flex justify-between items-center menuItem_71eca" data-context="sidebar-build-pumble" style="border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><h2 class="py-2 px-3 class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/developer-account.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/triggers-reference.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Triggers</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/interactive-elements-reference.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Interactive Elements</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/api-client.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Api Client</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/blocks.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Blocks</span></div></a></div></div></div></section><section data-context="sidebar-publish-pumble" style="border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><h2 class="py-2 px-3 text-sm font-medium flex" style="font-size: 14px; padding-left: 24px; font-weight: bold;"><span class="flex-center" style="font-size: 14px;">PUBLISH</span></h2></div><div class="transition-all duration-300 ease-in-out" style="overflow: hidden;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-group transition-opacity duration-500 ease-in-out" style="opacity: 1; margin-left: 12px;"><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/publish/publishing-and-guidelines.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Publishing and Guidelines</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/publish/private-addon-deployment.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Private addon deployment</span></div></a></div></div></div></section></nav></div></aside><div class="content_edeb4 rspress-doc-container flex flex-shrink-0 mx-auto"><div class="w-full flex-1"><div><div class="rspress-doc"><h1 id="basic-concepts" class="rspress-doc-title text-3xl mb-10 leading-10 tracking-tight title_3b154">Basic Concepts<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#basic-concepts">#</a></h1>
<h2 id="pumble-app-components" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Pumble App components<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#pumble-app-components">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">A Pumble App has three main parts:</p>
<ol class="list-decimal pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><strong class="font-semibold">The manifest</strong>: The manifest is your app definition registered in Pumble.
In the manifest you define your app name, bot name, all your triggers, event subscriptions, scopes etc.
While <code>pumble-cli</code> will make the process of creating and registering the manifest easy, you can read more about the manifest <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html">here</a></p>
</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><strong class="font-semibold">The bot</strong>: Optionally you can have a bot that comes along with your app. The bot is a user that represents your app in every workspace that your app is installed.<br>
You can use the bot to display useful information about your app logic or simply use it to communicate with users. For every workspace you will have a different bot id.<br>
When your app is installed in a workspace the bot user will be created and your app will receive an authorization code that, when used, will generate access tokens for both the user who installed your app and the bot. See <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/advanced-concepts.html#authorization">Authorization</a></p>
</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><strong class="font-semibold">Your app server</strong>: Pumble will notify your app on every event and trigger on the installed workspaces through the <strong class="font-semibold">public</strong> HTTP endpoints defined in the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/manifest.html">manifest</a>. So you will need to have a running HTTP server to be able to receive events and triggers from Pumble.</p>
</li>
</ol>
<h2 id="listening-to-messages" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Listening to messages<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#listening-to-messages">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To listen to messages, in the main <code>app</code> object we define handlers for <code>NEW_MESSAGE</code> event.<br>
Make sure you have <code>messages:read</code> in the <code>botScopes</code> in your <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/learn/quick-start.html#manifest-json"><code>manifest.json</code></a> (and optionally in <code>userScopes</code>)<br>
If only your App's bot has that scope you will listen to messages that bot has access to, otherwise you will receive messages for all authorized users with the scope.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The <code>NEW_MESSAGE</code> event handlers can have an optional <code>options</code> property.</p>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">required</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">match</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">string|RegExp</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Match if the message <code>text</code> includes a particular string or matches a RegExp pattern</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">includeBotMessages</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">boolean</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">no (default false)</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">If it's set to true your app bot messages will be received by the handler</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> app</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> App </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>	events</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'NEW_MESSAGE'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>            name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'NEW_MESSAGE'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span><span>            name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'NEW_MESSAGE'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span><span>            options</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span> match</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token regex-delimiter" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">/</span><span class="token regex-source language-regex" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">^hello</span><span class="token regex-delimiter" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">/</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span><span>            </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">handler</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">22</span><span>				</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Received a message that STARTS with hello"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> 
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">23</span><span>							ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>payload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>body</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>tx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">24</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">25</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">26</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">27</span><span>            name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'NEW_MESSAGE'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">28</span><span>            options</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span> includeBotMessages</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token boolean">true</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">29</span><span>            </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">handler</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">30</span><span>				</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-symbol);">console</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">log</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Received user or bot message"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">31</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">32</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">33</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">34</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">//...</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 3.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">35</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive tip"><div class="rspress-directive-title">TIP</div><div class="rspress-directive-content"><p class="my-4 leading-7">Events can have one or more handlers.</p></div></div>
<h2 id="sending-messages" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Sending messages<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#sending-messages">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The easiest way to send messages in your app is by using the <code>say()</code> function inside your listeners.<br>
The code below will send an ephemeral message on behalf of your App's bot.<br>
To be able to do this make sure you have <code>messages:write</code> scope for your bot (in your <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/learn/quick-start.html#manifest-json"><code>manifest.json</code></a>).<br>
<strong class="font-semibold">To send a rich message, use the <code>blocks</code> field. Click <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/blocks.html">here</a> to see more details on <code>blocks</code>.</strong></p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>	name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'NEW_MESSAGE'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>	options</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span> includeBotMessages</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token boolean">true</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>	</span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">handler</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">say</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Received a message"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive tip"><div class="rspress-directive-title">TIP</div><div class="rspress-directive-content"><p class="my-4 leading-7">Ephemeral messages can be sent on any channel (including user's self channel, DM's, Group Conversations and Private or Public channel)<br>
They are sent only to the user who triggered the event, and they will not be persisted.
</p></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><code>say()</code> function also accepts a second argument which by default is <code>ephemeral</code> but it can be changed to <code>in_channel</code> in order
to post that message as a normal message.
In this case the bot will post a normal message.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>	name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'NEW_MESSAGE'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>	</span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">handler</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">say</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"Received a message"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">"in_channel"</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive warning"><div class="rspress-directive-title">WARNING</div><div class="rspress-directive-content"><p class="my-4 leading-7">While it's not required for the bot to be a member of the channel where it posts, if the bot is trying to post a message in a DM channel, or Group DM channel where he is not a member this method will fail.<br>
Bots will be able to post messages in any Public or Private channel.
</p></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To send message on behalf of users your app needs to have <code>messages:write</code> user <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/learn/quick-start.html#manifest-json">scope</a>, and users should have authorized your app.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>	name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'NEW_MESSAGE'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>	</span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">handler</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// This will return author's client. </span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">// To get any other user in the same workspace user ctx.getUserClient(user_id)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> userClient </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getUserClient</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">if</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>userClient</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> userClient</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>v1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>messages</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">postMessageToChannel</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>				ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>payload</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>body</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span>cId</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span><span>				</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'Message form the same user'</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>			</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>

</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">In some contexts that are related to a single message such as <code>MessageShortcut</code>, <code>NEW_MESSAGE</code>, <code>UPDATED_MESSAGE</code>, <code>REACTION_ADDED</code> the <code>say()</code> function has the ability to reply to the message.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>	name</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'NEW_MESSAGE'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
