</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<div class="rspress-directive warning"><div class="rspress-directive-title">WARNING</div><div class="rspress-directive-content"><p class="my-4 leading-7"><code>fetchMessage()</code> will try to find if the triggering user has authorized your app and if so, it will try to fetch the message on behalf of that user.<br>
This means that users must have <code>messages:read</code> scope.<br>
If this is not successful it will try to fetch the message using the bot (if bot has access to that message).
</p></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">For more information about triggers and their contexts, click <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/triggers-reference.html">here</a>.</p>
<h3 id="interactive-components" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Interactive components<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#interactive-components">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Interactive components are <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/blocks.html">block</a> elements that add interactivity and enable users to interact with buttons, select menus, and similar components.
For more information about interactive components, click <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/interactivity.html">here</a>.</p>
<h2 id="authorization" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Authorization<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#authorization">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">When your App is published it will be visible to all workspaces, so they can install and authorize your app.<br>
Installation means that a bot user for your app will be created and you will receive both bot authorization code and user authorization code (for the user that installed your app initially)<br>
Other users in the workspace have to authorize in order for you app to receive their authorization codes.<br>
Users have to go to the <code>Configure Apps</code> page in Pumble (by clicking Add apps in the sidebar) and the will be able to install/authorize your app from there.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To capture the authorization codes of installing/authorizing users Pumble SDK provides a simple way to set up the page that Pumble will send users to, after they authorize.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> app</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> App </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>    tokenStore</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">new</span><span> </span><span class="token class-name">JsonFileTokenStore</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'tokens.json'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>	redirect</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span> enable</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token boolean">true</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">//... Triggers</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">In order to share the installation link with a user you can use the <code>context.getAuthUrl()</code> in the context of triggers/events.</p>
<div class="language-typescript"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-typescript" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> app</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> App </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-comment);">//...</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span><span>	slashCommands</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">[</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span><span>		</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span><span>            command</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">'/my_slash_command'</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span><span>            </span><span class="token function-variable" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">handler</span><span class="token operator">:</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">async</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span>ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token operator">=&gt;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span><span>                </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">ack</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span><span>				</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">const</span><span> userClient </span><span class="token operator">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">getUserClient</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span><span>				</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">if</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token operator">!</span><span>userClient</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span><span>				</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">else</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">{</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span><span>					</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-keyword);">await</span><span> ctx</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">.</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-function);">say</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">(</span><span class="token template-string template-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">`</span><span class="token template-string" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">You are authorized</span><span class="token template-string template-punctuation" style="color: var(--code-token-string);">`</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">)</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span><span>				</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span><span>            </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">,</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span><span>        </span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span><span>	</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">]</span><span>
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">}</span><span class="token" style="color: var(--code-token-punctuation);">;</span></span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>

  <div id="root"><div><div class="navContainer_f6cde rspress-nav px-6 " style="position: sticky;"><div class="container_f6cde flex justify-between items-center h-full"><div class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#lifecycle">#</a></h1>
<h2 id="definition" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Definition<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#definition">#</a></h2>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The lifecycle of an add-on consists of all the steps beginning from when it's installed until when the add-on gets uninstalled.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Throughout its lifecycle whe add-on may be in one of the two states:</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">active - it's loaded on the Clockify UI, receives events and can interact with the Clockify API</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">inactive - it's not loaded and cannot interact with Clockify, but it's still installed and all the user data are still kept</li>
</ul>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">A general lifecycle of an add-on includes the following events:</p>
<ul class="list-disc pl-5 my-4 leading-7">
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Installed</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Status changed</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Settings updated</li>
<li class="[&amp;:not(:first-child)]:mt-2">Deleted</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="types" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Types<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#types">#</a></h2>
<h3 id="installed" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Installed<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#installed">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Add-on is installed on a workspace.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To receive this event, the add-on must declare the <code>INSTALLED</code> lifecycle hook as part of its lifecycles.
During installation, a lifecycle event is triggered and the add-on is provided with the installation context and a set of <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html#installation-token">tokens</a>.</p>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">It is important to note that this payload will only be supplied <strong class="font-semibold">once</strong> for each add-on installation.</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">We recommend persisting the installation payload in your database if your add-on meets, or plans to meet in the future, the use cases where an <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html#installation-token">installation token</a> may be needed.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The data included in the installation payload, including the API URLs and tokens, are dependent on the environment and the region where the add-on is installed. If you intend to interact with the Clockify APIs, you <strong class="font-semibold">must</strong> always use the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html#claims">appropriate URLs</a> for the specific environment.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Example of a payload that is sent as part of the <code>INSTALLED</code> event:</p>
<div class="language-http"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-http" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>Request Headers
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span>Content-Type : application/json
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span>X-Addon-Lifecycle-Token : {{token}}
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span>{
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span>  "addonId": "62ddf9b201f42e74228efa3c",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span>  "authToken": "{{token}}",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span>  "workspaceId": "60332d61ff30282b1f23e624",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span>  "asUser": "60348d63df70d82b7183e635",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span>  "apiUrl": "{{apiUrl}}",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span>  "addonUserId": "1a2b3c4d5e6f7g8h9i0j1k2l",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span>  "webhooks": [{
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span>     "path": "https://example.com/webhook"
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span>     "webhookType": "ADDON"
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span>     "authToken": "{{token}}"
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span>  }], 
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span>}</span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The <code>authToken</code> is an API token that can be used to make authenticated requests to the Clockify API. For more information, read the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html#installation-token">Authentication and authorization</a> sectuib.</p>
<h3 id="status-changed" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Status changed<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#status-changed">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">After installation, the add-on is automatically enabled and becomes active.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">There are cases where the user may choose to deactivate an add-on instead of uninstalling it, for instance if they do not wish to use the add-on at the present but still want to preserve their settings and configurations.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">To receive this event, the add-on must declare the <code>STATUS_CHANGED</code> lifecycle hook as part of its lifecycles.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Example of a payload that is sent as part of the <code>STATUS_CHANGED</code> event:</p>
<div class="language-http"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-http" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>Request Headers
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span>Content-Type : application/json
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span>X-Addon-Lifecycle-Token : {{token}}
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span>{
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span>  "addonId": "62ddf9b201f42e74228efa3c",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span>  "workspaceId": "60332d61ff30282b1f23e624",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span>  "status": "INACTIVE"
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span>}</span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" d="M4 18H2V4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h14v2H4Z"></path></svg><svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-success_15153"><path fill="#49cd37" d="m13 24-9-9 1.414-1.414L13 21.171 26.586 7.586 28 9 13 24z"></path></svg></button></div></div></div>
<blockquote class="border-l-2 border-solid border-divider pl-4 my-6 transition-colors duration-500 blockquote_3b154">
<p class="my-4 leading-7">The <code>status</code> values can be either <code>ACTIVE</code> or <code>INACTIVE</code></p>
</blockquote>
<h3 id="settings-updated" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Settings updated<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#settings-updated">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">An add-on can have its <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/manifest/structured-settings.html">settings structure</a> defined inside the manifest.
In these cases, the add-on can subscribe to the <code>SETTINGS_UPDATED</code> lifecycle hook to be notified anytime one of its users updates the settings for the add-on.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Example of a payload that is sent as part of the <code>SETTINGS_UPDATED</code> event:</p>
<div class="language-http"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-http" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>Request Headers
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span>Content-Type : application/json
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span>X-Addon-Lifecycle-Token : {{token}}
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span>{
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span>  "workspaceId": "60332d61ff30282b1f23e624",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span>  "addonId": "62ddf9b201f42e74228efa3c",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span>  "settings": [
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span>    {
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">10</span>      "id": "txt-setting",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">11</span>      "name": "Txt setting",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">12</span>      "value": "Some text"
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">13</span>    },
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">14</span>    {
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">15</span>      "id": "link-setting",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">16</span>      "name": "Link setting",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">17</span>      "value": "https://clockify.me"
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">18</span>    },
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">19</span>    {
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">20</span>      "id": "number-setting",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">21</span>      "name": "Number setting",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">22</span>      "value": 5
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">23</span>    },
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">24</span>    {
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">25</span>      "id": "checkbox-setting",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">26</span>      "name": "Checkbox setting",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">27</span>      "value": true
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">28</span>    },
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">29</span>    {
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">30</span>      "id": "dropdown-single-setting",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">31</span>      "name": "Dropdown single setting",

</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">33</span>    },

</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">35</span>      "id": "dropdown-multiple-setting",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">36</span>      "name": "Dropdown multiple setting",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">37</span>      "value": [

<h3 id="deleted" class="mt-10 mb-2 leading-7 text-xl title_3b154">Deleted<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#deleted">#</a></h3>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">When an add-on is deleted from a workspace, a lifecycle event is triggered and the add-on is provided with the context for the installation that is being uninstalled.
All the <a class="link_03735  link_3b154 inline-link_3b154 cursor-pointer" target="" href="/clockify/build/authentication-and-authorization.html">tokens</a> that are provided to the add-on become invalid and from that moment on, the add-on can no longer interact with the Clockify API on behalf of the workspace user.</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7">Example of a payload that is sent as part of the <code>DELETED</code> event:</p>
<p class="my-4 leading-7"><code>DELETED</code></p>
<div class="language-http"><div class="rspress-code-content rspress-scrollbar"><div><pre class="code" style="background-color: inherit;"><code class="language-http" style="white-space: pre;"><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">1</span><span>Request Headers
</span></span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">2</span>Content-Type : application/json
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">3</span>X-Addon-Lifecycle-Token : {{token}}
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">4</span>
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">5</span>{
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">6</span>  "addonId": "62ddf9b201f42e74228efa3c",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">7</span>  "workspaceId": "60332d61ff30282b1f23e624",
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">8</span>  "asUser": "60348d63df70d82b7183e635"
</span><span style="display: block; padding: 0px 1.25rem;"><span class="linenumber react-syntax-highlighter-line-number" style="display: inline-block; min-width: 2.25em; padding-right: 1em; text-align: right; user-select: none; color: var(--code-token-comment);">9</span>}</span></code></pre></div><div class="code-button-group_15153"><button title="Toggle code wrap"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrapped_15153"><path fill="#22a041" d="M21 5H3v2h18zM3 19h7v-2H3zm0-6h15c1 0 2 .43 2 2s-1 2-2 2h-2v-2l-4 3 4 3v-2h2c2.95 0 4-1.27 4-4 0-2.72-1-4-4-4H3z"></path></svg><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" class="icon-wrap_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M16 7H3V5h13v2M3 19h13v-2H3v2m19-7-4-3v2H3v2h15v2l4-3Z"></path></svg></button><button class="code-copy-button_15153" title="Copy code"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 30 30" class="icon-copy_15153"><path fill="currentColor" d="M28 10v18H10V10h18m0-2H10a2 2 0 0 0-2 2v18a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h18a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V10a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"></path><path fill="currentColor" class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/publish/private-addon-deployment.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; rspress-doc-container flex flex-shrink-0 mx-auto"><div class="w-full flex-1"><div><div class="rspress-doc"><h2 id="button" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Button<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#button">#</a></h2>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The type of element. In this case type is always <code>button</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">text</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">TextElement</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A text object that defines the button's text. Max length for the text field in this object is 75 characters.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">value</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Any metadata defined by the app that will be included in the interaction payload object.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">url</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">URL that will open in the user's browser. The block interaction event will also be triggered.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">style</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Decorates buttons with alternative visual color schemes. Options include: <code>primary</code>, <code>secondary</code>, <code>warning</code>, <code>danger</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">onAction</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Action identifier defined by the app (controlled and used on the app's side).</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">confirm</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">ConfirmDialog</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A confirmation modal that will be shown just before triggering the block interaction, prompting the user to confirm the action.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="plain-text-input" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Plain text input<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#plain-text-input">#</a></h2>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The type of element. In this case type is always <code>plain_text_input</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">initial_value</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Text that will be displayed initially.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">placeholder</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">TextElement</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A text object that defines input placeholder text. Max length for the text field in this object is 75 characters.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">multiline</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Boolean</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Indicates if input field can contain multiple lines.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">min_length</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Integer</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Min text length.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">max_length</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Integer</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Max text length.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">interaction_triggers</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">['on_enter_pressed', 'on_input']</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Determines which user action(s) will dispatch block interaction event.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="select-menu-static" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Select menu (static)<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#select-menu-static">#</a></h2>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The type of element. In this case type is always <code>static_select_menu</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">placeholder</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">TextElement</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A text object that defines the select menu's placeholder text. Max length for the text field in this object is 75 characters.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">options</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Option[]</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">An array of option objects. Maximum number of options is 100. If <code>option_groups</code> is specified, this field should not be.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">option_groups</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">OptionGroup[]</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">An array of option group objects. Maximum number of option groups is 100. If <code>options</code> is specified, this field should not be.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">initial_option</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Option[] or OptionGroup[]</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A single option that exactly matches one of the options within options or option_groups. This option will be selected when the menu initially loads.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">onAction</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Action identifier defined by the app (controlled and used on the app's side).</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">confirm</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">ConfirmDialog</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A confirmation modal that will be shown just before triggering the block interaction, prompting the user to confirm the action.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="select-menu-dynamic" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Select menu (dynamic)<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#select-menu-dynamic">#</a></h2>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">name</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The type of element. In this case type is always <code>dynamic_select_menu</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">placeholder</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">TextElement</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A text object that defines the select menu's placeholder text. Max length for the text field in this object is 75 characters.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">min_query_length</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Integer</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">If this field is not defined, a request will be sent on every character change. To reduce the number of requests sent, use this field to specify the minimum number of typed characters required before dispatching.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">initial_option</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Option[] or OptionGroup[]</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">This option will be selected when the menu initially loads.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">onAction</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Action identifier defined by the app (controlled and used on the app's side).</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">confirm</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">ConfirmDialog</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A confirmation modal that will be shown just before triggering the block interaction, prompting the user to confirm the action.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="confirmdialog" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">ConfirmDialog<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#confirmdialog">#</a></h2>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">

<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">type</th>
<th align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 text-text-1 text-base font-semibold border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">title</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">TextElement</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A text object that defines the dialog's title. Max length for the text field in this object is 75 characters.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">text</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">TextElement</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A text object that defines the dialog's text. Max length for the text field in this object is 300 characters.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">confirm</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">TextElement</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A text object that defines the confirm button text. Max length for the text field in this object is 75 characters.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">deny</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">TextElement</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A text object that defines the deny button text. Max length for the text field in this object is 75 characters.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">style</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Defines the color scheme applied to the <code>confirm</code> button. Options include: <code>primary</code>, <code>secondary</code>, <code>warning</code>, <code>danger</code>.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 id="option" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Option<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#option">#</a></h2>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<thead>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">

</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">

<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A unique string value that will be passed to the app when this option is chosen. The maximum length is 100 characters.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">description</td>

<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">A text object that defines option's description. Max length for the text field in this object is 75 characters.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

<h2 id="text-element" class="mt-12 mb-6 pt-8 text-2xl tracking-tight border-t-[1px] border-divider-light title_3b154">Text element<a class="link_3b154 header-anchor" aria-hidden="true" href="#text-element">#</a></h2>
<table class="block border-collapse text-base my-5 overflow-x-auto leading-7 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">

<tbody>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">

<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">String</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">The type of element. In this case type is always <code>plain_text</code>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">text</td>

<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Text that will be displayed.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="border border-solid transition-colors duration-500 even:bg-soft border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">emoji</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Boolean</td>
<td align="left" class="border border-solid px-4 py-2 border-gray-light-3 dark:border-divider">Indicates whether emojis in a text field should be escaped into the colon emoji format.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>

0;"><span>Modals &amp; Views</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/advanced-concepts.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Advanced Concepts</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/pumble-cli.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/triggers-reference.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/interactive-elements-reference.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Interactive Elements</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/api-client.html"><div class="menuItem_71eca mt-0.5 py-2 px-3 font-medium flex" style="font-size: 13px; margin-left: 18px; border-radius: 0 var(--rp-radius) var(--rp-radius) 0;"><span>Api Client</span></div></a></div><div class="rspress-sidebar-item"><a class="link_03735 menuLink_71eca cursor-pointer" target="" href="/pumble/build/blocks.html"><div
